dictionnaire.value: I saw it as a bigger object
Luckily the room was empty, we weren’t crazy
A USB stick can really solve a network problem ?
Press F or Right Ctrl to use the scooter
We are two game developers with 10+ years of experience founding a studio in France.
We worked together in companies like Hydravision (Obscure, Alone in the Dark) and Ankama (Dofus, Wakfu, Abraca).
We also created a Game Jam collective called TurboDindon, which won Ludum Dare #23 with a game called Inside my Radio.
1P2P is an independent game development studio for PC and home consoles.

2054 is a young video game studio composed of a solo team, which was born in September 2020. This studio is the result of more than two years of work and lots and lots of passion...And...many liters of coffee!!!
One-woman studio held by Agnès Vuillaume, aka Clemenc, computer scientist and painter by training.

First title of a long series to follow, on October 14, 2021, the point'n'click The Sundew, of which Agnès realizes the technical part, the narration and the graphics and receives the help of passionate contributors for other aspects.
We are a French video game development studio founded by three women from the video game industry.
We seek to create games that integrate new mechanics and explore topics of daily life as well as social issues, through innovative storytelling tools.
We are convinced that video games can be entertaining, while at the same time bringing strong social values and messages to a wide and diverse audience.
Alambik Studio is a video game development studio. The games are centered around gameplay mechanics promoting self-help, social connection and resilience.
With the game Diluvian Winds, Alambik offers a simulation of veil-punk in a context of exile due to the rising waters. Survive by developing your community in your lighthouse !
Founded in 2001, Ankama is today an independent digital creation group specialized in the field of entertainment and a key player in the video game world !

Since the phenomenal success in 2004 of the online game DOFUS (85 million accounts have been created worldwide, including over 40 million in France). Ankama has invested in several areas of activity to become a true transmedia group.
This is the official account of the indie game dev studio Atelier 801, creators of Transformice ! Watch out for real life photos and more !

Baby Corp is a young independent studio created in 2019. It was born from the student project Baby Storm at the Isart Digital Paris school. After many positive feedbacks and the desire of a united team, we decided to embark on the adventure of creating this studio.
The studio is located in Saint Amand les Eaux in the Hauts de France region.
The first objective was the marketing of Baby Storm on Nintendo Switch which was released on this platform on January 21, 2022.
Since then, Baby Corp continues its activity in the development of new features for Baby Storm and prepares other projects.

Located 7 km from Lille, the C&P studio offers many services around sound: recording artists, making video clips, sound design for companies, training, etc... Based on our experience of 10 years, we have produced hundreds of songs in a wide variety of styles and developed the sound identity of many media for companies. Whether you are an artist or a company, our keyword is Quality and we will find the sound/images you love so much.
Award-winning PR agency for PC, console, mobile games. Cosmocover helps indie developers and AAA publishers since 2009.Visit our newsroom to see for yourself.

Alongside our core Press, Public relations work, we’re experts in influencers PR,  event management, production and content creation.  If you’re interested in our services, drop us a line here. Journalists, influencers, content creators sign up to our media list here.
If you’re like us, get in touch.

Game IN is an association law 1901 created in 2009 by the professionals of the video game installed on the North of France, in order to put in place a structure capable of creating and maintaining a real ecosystem, and to support all private and public approaches to video games in all its forms.

Since its creation, Game IN has been able to count on the support and listening of the territories. The Hauts-de-France Region and the European Metropolis of Lille actively contribute to the strength of our local industry.

Ishtar Games is an independent French studio based in Lille and Bordeaux (France). Formerly known as CCCP, we have been creating games since 2005. Our serious-game studio is located in Bordeaux while we, independent creators, are based in Lille !

On a former industrial site of 5 hectares exceptionally rehabilitated within the Lille metropolis, the Plaine Images is the European hub dedicated to creative industries: audiovisual, game, AR/VR, Design (virtual reality, video games, serious game/e-learning, animation, edtech, musictech, digital marketing, events...). At the heart of Europe, our complete ecosystem brings together 140 companies, 1,800 active employees, 4 schools, 1 incubator, film and sound studios, a playtest laboratory, etc. Our strength: creating synergies and fostering business development !
We are 4 creative based in Lille, authors of Toasterball , a multiplayer sports game with toasters.
We also work on a lot of other nice projects, for our customers or for ourselves.
Ludogram is an interactive storytelling agency that creates interactive series.

Ludogram creates interactive formats (video, game, application, etc.) to better tell the stories of our customers. They create communication campaigns or licence adaptations. They also produce serious games, especially for heritage players. In B to C, they produce their own interactive series on mobile, through their «Serieplay» catalog.

Founded in October 2019, following the decision taken by Bigben (a company listed on Euronext Paris, B compartment, under security code FR0000074072) to consolidate all components of its Gaming Division into a new entity, NACON is a pure-play in video gaming, publishing and developing video games as well as designing and distributing premium gaming accessories.

The creation of NACON has several goals: bringing publishing and accessories together under a strong brand, concentrating the expertise and talent of professionals operating in the same industry, but also maximizing synergies by vertically integrating the activities involved in order to create value.

For more than 30 years, the region, through the Pictanovo regional tool, has been working with authors, directors, technicians, actors and entrepreneurs to structure and federate an ecosystem around creation and innovation.

Pictanovo supports nearly 230 works, feature films, short films, documentaries, television series and unitary, films and animation series and intensifies the development of innovation and new writings in the field of transmedia, virtual reality and webseries, a real lever of attractiveness for our territory.

Pictanovo supports its action on a balanced territorial anchorage around the 3 sites: Arenberg Creative Mine in Wallers-Arenberg, the Plain Images in Roubaix-Tourcoing and the Digital Greenhouse in Valenciennes.
After the closure of the studio we were working for, feu Hydravision, we – seven former employees and member of the same team – decided to put our savings into a new video game studio.

We decided to go full indie, self-published and self funded: we self-published Ethan: Meteor Hunter on PS3/Vita/Steam/Xbox One (and survived its bad sales) and Ludum Dare 23’s jam winner Inside My Radio on PC Steam, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and WiiU. Yes, WiiU, you read that right.
We are now helping other indies to bring their game to consoles! We are a team of 6 people (3 full time coders, 2 freelancers and a sleepy producer) with more than 10 years experience each.

Spooky rabbits is an independent studio created in April 2019, composed of François Dervaux President of the entity, Mathieu dervaux vice president as well as Leo Capou intervening in the company as Game Designer.

It is a recent studio that advocates excellence, rigor and craftsmanship. François, Mathieu and Léo are starting to work on the production of their first game named Dogend, more information is to come about the project.
The “Dogend” project started in January 2020, at the initiative of François Dervaux. The first ambition of the game was to create a demanding and nervous rogueLite, all in a 20.

He then started working on a first prototype to validate the concept. Two months later, his twin brother Mathieu joined the project to participate in the development of the game of the game as a UI/UX specialist. Moreover, under his influence, the narrative dimension became a central to become a central element.

The first prototype allowed us to convince Léo Capou to join the project in order to bring his expertise in game design. The game mechanics are becoming clearer and the idea of an endless day where the player's interactions have strong repercussions.
Square Squid is a video game creation studio.
We put all our ambition and expertise at your service to bring you quality projects that meet your needs.

The cloud changes the way studios build video games. Stormancer industrializes the creation and distribution of real-time multiplayer titles, providing developers with a powerful cloud infrastructure specifically designed for this purpose. Our innovative megaserver technology allows studios to express their creativity. Stormancer handles the rest.

Stormancer allows video game studios to create real-time multiplayer games faster with our tools and platform as a service (PaaS). Our innovative megaserver system on the internet is able to mount in just a few clicks to seize all opportunities. We also support studios in their multiplayer developments by providing them with advice and support.
Synnaxium Studio is an indie game development studio currently composed of four people based in Tourcoing (France).
Our objective is to regularly propose you a short yet intense game with a strong narrative aspect to dive you into our world.
Young Souls is a fine mix of epic action in numerous dungeons but also a captivating story about adolescence and its demons, friendship, brotherhood, family and duty.

Rediscover the universe of classic games of the 80s and the magic of a world in the grip of its own demons through the point'n'click The Sundew. In this futuristic world, Anna, a cyborg struggling with her own hierarchy, will try throughout the game to find her way through the choices you will make.
Record audio clips, broadcast them and unravel the mystery of the time loop in this interactive radio survey.

Discover the other side of the scenery of the national news station News One, in this prequel held a few months before the events of Alt-Frequencies. The station is trying to find a new editorial line, and it will be up to you to help it accomplish this task. Which stories will you choose to broadcast, which angles will you adopt? Make the right choices during your trial period, and maybe you’ll get a job at the station.

The game takes the form of a narrative investigation: one is led to search the messages, photos and applications of the phone, in order to learn more about the person to whom it belonged. Through this phone, we discover Sam’s life, friends, family and love stories, until his mysterious disappearance on the evening of his 18th birthday.

The game takes the form of a narrative survey: to progress, link the information found in the various messages, photos and applications. Through this phone, discover Laura’s life: her friendships, her professional life, as well as the events that led to her mysterious disappearance and the loss of her phone.

Diluvian is a 2D side-view and semi-real-time adventure/management game where the sea level rises to the point of causing an exodus. The player plays the Keeper, an individual who refuses to leave his lighthouse and becomes a witness of this exodus.
Expand your community by floating, flying and even submerging. Each sheltered refugee will modify the lighthouse to allow it to cope with the constantly rising waters.
Enter a poetic universe combining sailpunk architecture and anthropomorphism. To survive, the Keeper will have to choose which desperate travelers to welcome or reject.

The first game of the studio and one of the first MMORPG in Flash designed at that time named Dofus. A free online RPG game. Dungeons, treasure hunts, monsters, bosses, pets, companions and player vs. player (PvP) mode await you in this strategy game. Still in the world of Krosmoz, we find Wakfu, Krosmaga, or Dofus touch available on mobile.
Card games, role playing games or board games, Ankama also offers board games to play with friends or family. Among them we find Kromaster Arena, Monster Slaughter, Stellium...

Managed by the subsidiary of the main company named Ankama animations, their most famous work to date is the Wakfu series which takes up the universe of Krosmoz based on the video games Dofus and Wakfu. Other works accompany this one in particular films like Mutafukaz or even Princess Dragon released more recently.
Atypical, demanding, inventive, the Ankama publishing house distinguishes itself by a catalog as diverse as it is explosive and claims a pronounced taste for art and image.

Mangas, comics, comic books...: its various collections form an eclectic catalog where originality, audacity and creativity are mixed. Its greatest successes are the proof: Radiant, City Hall, Freaks' Squeele, DOFUS or Shangri-la. Reading an Ankama Editions title is always an entertaining and original experience.

Transformice is an MMO platformer where dozens of mice try to bring back the cheese! Will the Almighty Shaman help you or destroy everything? Millions of levels, physics, skill trees, and most importantly... hats !
Dead Maze is a massively multiplayer 2D isometric game taking place in a destroyed contemporary world, invaded by zombies.

Boom, an explosive multiplayer game full of hamsters! Face other players in explosive battles. Blow up the walls and your enemies through labyrinthine levels and be the last to stay alive as the play area shrinks !
Baby Storm is a frenetic couch co-op party game where you have to take care of unruly babies in several nurseries !
Run, clean, feed, cuddle to get the best score.

Installed in a building equipped with a spacious control room and two recording rooms with an advanced acoustic treatment, the C&P studio can adapt to all sound situations: multi-track sound recording, live recording, voice-over for an advertisement or a video game. The many choices offered by our microphone park, our analog peripherals (preamp, compressor, equalizer) and our backline will allow you to obtain a recording in perfect harmony with your objectives.
We master all the necessary positions for the elaboration of film quality video clips: Capture, Video editing, Colorimetry, Special effects.
Our main recording room is at your disposal for your group rehearsals on the Lille metropolis. Its generous size and its advanced acoustic treatment will allow you to repeat in excellent conditions.
We work with you to develop smart strategy and content, then execute internationally according to your needs.
With our in-house team and partner network, we execute in US, UK, France, Germany, Benelux, Spain, Italy and the Nordic countries.

Our core services include: strategic and tactical planning; tailored targeting from mainstream and lifestyle to specialist and long tail media; content localization; HTML press releases with embedded assets and social media functionality; one-on-one media outreach; comprehensive reporting.
Our combined experience across platforms and genres means we can provide intelligent and actionable marketing insight.
We take time to examine your needs and work with you to develop an effective and measurable plan, whether it’s traditional PR, a content strategy, social media tactics, or more.
From big shows to dedicated game showcases, we always deliver professional and unforgettable events.

We showcased games from a number of clients on our own stand at Gamescom in 2013 and 2014, managed appointments for multiple clients at E3, and recently staged successful media events in France and Italy for SEGA and InnoGames.
The great annual gathering of the French video game industry returns for its 5th edition on June 23/24 !
2 days for professionals and future professionals of ALL Video Game professions.
Every month, we organize one of our afterworks in the territories of Hauts-de France and Lille.

Today, the Afterworks become monthly and keep the same DNA: bring together professionals and supporters of the industry around a theme, a speaker, or just a designated place to exchange, consolidate and ensure the life and development of our network.
Lakeburg Legacies is a village management simulator focused on social interactions with the goal of building the most effective families to grow and prosper your kingdom.

Defend the last bastion of humanity with your team of heroes in this tactical RPG with roguelite mechanics! Exterminate evil monsters at night. Prepare and repair the defences of your city, during the day, before the new wave arrives !
Dead In Vinland is a survival management game with elements of RPG and adventure, in which you will play the life of a family of Vikings trying to survive on a mysterious island.

The Plaine Images, the largest European hub dedicated to creative industries and innovation, launches the Plaine Images Xpérience: a business event, generating experiences and emotions, that will allow you to enjoy meetingsyou qualified and meet new partners.

PIX will make you (re)discover an ecosystem dedicated to Creative Industries that is unique in Europe, with 150 companies and so much know-how and the ability of these industries to bring innovation and creativity to your business.

One ball, two goals, and... toasters. Welcome to Toasterball. Compete with friends up to 4 players in this somewhat unusual tournament, where toasters are athletes, and where the laws of physics are optional.
To save a lost village in Siberia, Russian convoys take the road to the far north, to find themselves confronted with the awakening of myths and legends dating back several millennia.
Available on the Serieplay app (iOS and Android)
Will Alex and Mackenzie, separated by light years, manage to meet despite the distance? An original story by Hugo Labrande.

Nacon has been a leading gaming accessories brand for over 20 years and offers a wide range of accessories for both casual and hardcore gamers. With the recent success of the Revolution Unlimited Pro Controller, Nacon has established itself as a leading brand for all players and gaming professionals.
Nacon now has a very wide range of products. Gaming headsets, microphones, controllers, steering wheels and gaming chairs are available in Europe, Asia, Oceania and part of the African continent.

Nacon develops and publishes AA games for consoles and PC. This market segment is different from the AAA game category and encompasses all games that generate sales of between 200,000 and 3 million copies.
All Nacon projects are built around creativity, expertise and distinctiveness. These are the four genres we specialise in:

Dead in Vinland is a management/survival game, mixed with elements of RPG and adventure, around a family of Vikings trying to survive on a mysterious island. Exiled on a remote and unknown island, help Eirik and his family in their quest for survival. Manage their mental and physical health, explore the island, organize your camp and deal with other humans. Some will help you, others will be less... friendly. Reveal the esoteric mysteries of Vinland. They could save your life... Or lead you to your doom.
Versions we’re porting: Google Stadia, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
Young Souls is a stylish blend of epic action in a wide range of dungeons and a captivating story about the challenges of adolescence, friendship, kinship, family and duty.
Versions we ported: Xbox Series, Xbox One and Windows Store
A strange signal… an alien craft… an interplanetary, gravity-defying journey through space and time.
Take control of a bush and challenge your friends in a hide and seek game up to 4 players.
In a Film Noir atmosphere with a very Art Deco style, you play as Gualtiero a taciturn and cynical hero.

During this fast-paced adventure, the player will have the opportunity to explore the city of LeedShaw, an ersatz New York City of the 20's, filled with colorful characters, all supported by a jazzy soundtrack that is omnipresent in the game !
Switch between two characters, explore temples full of enemies and treasures, unlock abilities, customize your characters, die, learn and start over to save the world from the evil Maghamir.
Play as trees that rip and tear by throwing saws at each other through different levels. The last tree standing wins the game.

Awarded Most Anticipated MMORPG in 2017, Ashes of Creation is a unique take on the MMORPG genre. Ashes of Creation uses our spatial technology to create a dynamic world structure, built to react to the actions of players in realtime. Dynamic quests, cities that grow and fall... a unique world that never stop changing thanks to our scalable distributed technology. We take care of load balancing, replication, networking on the server and many more. On top of that, Stormancer drastically reduces development time and cost that come with such an ambitious MMO.

Battlefleet Gothic: Armada is the RTS videogame adaptation of Games Workshop’s classic tabletop game, set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. We worked hand in hand with the studio to develop a competitive multiplayer mode: server infrastructure, game authentification, matchmaking, game sessions, etc. With our flexible infrastructure, Tindalos was able to create an isolated environnment for press events very quickly, allowing journalists to play together in the same game session.

Nominated Best Multiplayer Game by 2017 Golden Joystick Awards, Absolver is an action role-playing game based on martial arts fighting, featuring a seamless open world and massively multiplayer elements. We worked hand in hand with Sloclap to build a scalable data event pipeline for the game, and to improve the matchmaking experience of this ambitious online RPG.
Radiant Blade - With Light comes Darkness
At a crossroad between distant worlds, a creature of light known as Sika becomes involved in a conflict opposing the divine powers of creation.
Radiant Blade  is an action RPG mixing both real time action and narrative choices in an partially procedurally generated environment.
For some I am a projection of Jerome, for others I am 2P of 1P2P.
For Jerome, I am ugly. Nice to meet you.
Hello, welcome to our home, make yourself at home !
What does the locked door at the top of the stairs lead to ?
This is our old balcony, it is under renovation at the moment so it is inaccessible.
How are you? So how do you like our decor ? Not bad !
I am Agnès Vuillaume, founder of 2054 and creator of The Sundew.
A one-woman studio that aims to tell stories, highlight characters, especially female ones, while getting off the beaten track and cognitive bias.
Yes, I come from an artistic background and I love to paint during my free time.
Take care of yourself ! À plus !
I am Anna! The local cyborg cop! I'm extremely knowledgeable about all things tech and artificial intelligence. And you must be [PLAYER]! A pure human being who doesn't knock on doors!
Wow ! Hello ? I didn't hear you come in! Did you knock ?
I apologize, but it's urgent! All the networks of the Plaine Images are inaccessible and they are organizing an important event tonight! And PIX doesn't have the right protocol yet !
Yes I know what you're talking about... No wonder it's sticking,  give me a few seconds,  I'll prepare something that should solve the problem.
And that's it! Just give it to Plaine Images,  they'll know what to do with it.
Greetings! A new face in town? I haven't seen you around here before !
I am Miryam Houali ! Co-founder of Accidental Queens !
Don't hesitate if you need anything !
Nice crown ! Can I have one of these ?
I'm mainly in charge of the production of the assets of our games and the art direction !
You can look at the one on display on the shelf but don't touch it !
Welcome to the offices of Accidental Queens !
I am Diane Landais, co-founder of Accidental Queens.
We are an independent studio which has at heart to make games aiming at raising awareness on current issues.
Dealing with societal issues through video games is what drives us !
You can learn more about our titles by visiting the panel.
We host all survivors before the big storm arrives !
It was Laurent Peroy who gave me several tips for the construction.
A fine lighthouse connoisseur, a rather eccentric passion !
Hello I don't have a dialogue.
Hello I don't have a dialogue.
Is it normal to have mice on your desktops?
Jean-Baptiste Le marchand, the co-founder of the company Atelier 801! I am Melanie Christin's partner and friend.
Yes, these mice represent our wonderful community, without them, we would not be where we are today !
We are very fond of them, and they are also very calm and well-behaved! It makes us a little company! Do you want one ?
Don't make that face at last! Mice are not as undesirable as we think !
I am Mélanie Christin, co-founder of Atelier 801.
We are the independent studio that created the game Transformice.
Thanks to this title, we have been able to build a very dedicated community around the world.
This has greatly contributed to the success and longevity of our studio.
I am a baby without dialogue.
I am a baby without dialogue.
Hello and welcome to C&P Studio !
You are super well equipped here !
I'm Fredéric Pecqueur, the founder of C&P Studio! Here we do sound and video, and we even have 2 rehearsal studios. For video games, we do sound design as well as music composition.
Did you see that? We have high quality gear, which allows us to produce equally cool sounds.
See you soon and take care of yourself !
François Dervaux from Spooky Rabbits sent me to borrow an amp. Their current sound doesn't fit. Can you give me some advice ?
Yes of course! Here, take this one, right behind you. Knowing their style, it'll do just fine.
Hi [PLAYER], welcome to the Van Cosmocover.
Can I get a clue as to who is behind this mask?
Thank you! My former classmates have donated all these little souvenirs to me. At this rate, we will eventually run out of furniture to display them.
The van is already a bit messy, but the atmosphere is really nice !
To be honest, I only ''exist'' when I exchange and enjoy the different cultures the world has to offer.
If you really want to define me, I'm French, Spanish, English, Danish... I'm like Europe, I'm all that at the same time.
Good morning young artist! I didn't see you coming !

Welcome to the Game In village ! This village gathers all the video game companies existing in the Hauts de France ! Notre réseau se réparti sur toute la Région Hauts-de-France, avec une forte implantation en métropole lilloise.
Game IN is the association that represents the video game industry in the north of France.
Here, you will be able to visit a world in which various representatives of the association appear.
Many of our members are away on game jams, they should be back soon.
The general delegate of Game In.
Our ecosystem continues to grow and our mission is to support everyone on a daily basis.
Our vocation is to represent, animate, strengthen and develop our ecosystem.
Come back in a few weeks to start meeting them.
Get out and explore the area! You'll meet the people who live in the village, and thus our professional gaming ecosystem !
You must be [PLAYER]! I've heard of you before, everyone talks to each other a lot within the ecosystem.
You can check the quests available to you by pressing the R key, there are certainly members who need your help !

Manon Lesire ! I'm in charge of all Game IN's communication: promotion of the association's actions, collective approaches,  creating links between members, facilitating exchanges, managing our social networks, creating content…
... and the Game Camp France too ! I was sure you had already heard about it. It's the big annual gathering of video game pros. We created it with the Syndicat National du Jeu Vidéo in 2017.

I'm Sophie Maleval, I'm a Project Manager in the association. I follow the creators of videogame projects at the Plaine Image incubator in the creation of their studios and the development of their games.
I also intervene on different subjects to promote the video game industry. Don't hesitate to come to us if you have any questions, we are here to find solutions!
Hello ! It smells great in here! What do you suggest ?
I don't see the team, who are you ?
I have curd, warm water and hop juice, it's fizzy and not very tasty but everyone loves it.
I am the Mesopotamian goddess of war but also as goddess of love, Ishtar. I am the representation of the studio, which likes to make strategy games with deep gameplay.
Our productions are sometimes quite violent in their representations, whether in bloody confrontations, or by the fate we reserve for our characters.
Although we make games that are sometimes violent, we want our studio values to be expressed in our productions, especially through representation.

No matter if our subjects are fictional or close to reality, we take a lot of care with our characters, especially through the mix, the representation of LGBTQ+ people, because we try to get away from the usual stereotypes.
There is always an underlying message in line with our humanistic values.
If you want to know more, you can take a look at the bulletin board.
If you need it, don't hesitate.
I feel a little stiff from being still, waiting for you to leave so I can get on with my life. Like Andy's toys.
It's going pretty well! I just got back and I have to get ready to go back, I have a lot to do for the moment.
Hi you must be [PLAYER]!  Laurent told me about your new arrival in town! I guess you're interested in the afterwork tonight ? Unfortunately I don't think it can take place as it is…
I saw you were organizing an event !
I guess you mean the afterwork tonight? Unfortunately I don't know if it will be able to take place as it is…

All our networks have been down for several hours, impossible to get the list of participants to confirm their registrations! We are constantly innovating here and testing a new system, but I don't have the right protocol to solve this specific situation.
Now that I think about it, I might know someone in the network who could help us! Anna from 2054, she's very knowledgeable on the subject! Maybe you could go and ask her for help?
I would have gone there but I have no legs, and the networks are down …
I am PIX, the artificial intelligence at the service of Plaine Images

Plaine Images is the site of excellence for creative industries in the Lille metropolitan area, a major innovation park in the Hauts-de-France region! Our mission is to support all approaches that create value through the imagination of project leaders and entrepreneurs.
*Pulls the key in the socket* It's good Anna had the solution !
I think it's working! Everyone will get a notification now that the servers are working, a big thank you to you and welcome among us!
We are an independent studio specialized in the porting of video games to consoles.
Oh hi, you must be the guy François told me about earlier !
Thank you! A lot of work went into getting the perfect acoustic treatment without sacrificing the quality of the frame.
Ahah. Thanks for taking the time to bring us a new amp, we'll be able to test the new structure of this piece.
How do you spend your days ?
When I'm not making my own spells and mixtures, I really enjoy looking at the work of my peers.
It is always very valuable to be on the cutting edge of what is produced in our field, and as long as there are other mages, I will always have something to read and observe !
Ce terrain a été récemment acheté.
Come back soon to know this new member.
I am François Dervaux, I co-founded the Spooky Rabbit studio with my brother Mathieu !
We are currently working on a project called Dogend with our partner, Léo Capou!
Yeah I admit we're happy with it, but it would sound even better if we had a proper amp !

The one we have does not suit us, and the rendering is not quite as we want. Fred from the C&P studio is always very helpful. If you're ever there, could you ask him to lend us one, and tell him I sent you ?
Check the noticeboard in front of GameIN
Introduce yourself to the PI Hologram
Bring the USB Port to the Plaine Images
Introduce yourself to François Dervaux next to the Plaine Image
Bring the amplifier to Gualtierro at the Jazz club
